name: Frogstool
description:
Hey! This isn't where the porta-potties are...

Huh, a frog. It looks hungry. Maybe I should feed it. . .

Yeah, you should feed it, as it's about the only thing keeping your miserable soul from being forcefully removed from your body. But, while you're at it, you might want to find a way to escape this place. What's that? You'll just go back the way you came? Well, good luck with that. You may find it's harder to leave than you thought...

Frogstool is a top-down exploration horror experience that may leave you contemplating. This game was created for The BenBonk Game Jam #4 and will likely receive updates in the near future.

Have fun .;,;.

//bean
